summary: The protobuf package has introduced a new RepeatedField class and deprecated the old one. The PHP SDK needs to resolve all protobuf deprecations to maintain compatibility with newer versions.
userImpact: Users may face deprecation warnings and potential compatibility issues when using newer versions of the protobuf package.
rootCause: The protobuf package deprecated the old RepeatedField class in favor of a new implementation, requiring SDK updates to resolve the deprecations.
proposedFix: Update all usages of the deprecated RepeatedField class to the new RepeatedField class from the protobuf package.
resolutionDetails: All protobuf deprecations were resolved by updating to the new RepeatedField class.
keyQuote: A new RepeatedField class has been added in the protobuf package. The old RepeatedField is deprecated now. Need to resolve all the deprecations.
